about_the_game:
Get ready to peel back the layers of laughter in The SPUDFATHER!
This side-splitting spoof on classic spy adventures stars Spud, a charming but chivalrous secret agent working for THE ROOTS

Spud's mission?
Is to clean up the corrupt veggie underworld of PALIONAFOXA City in a hilarious romp through the classic ages.

The only hitch?
Spud has a major weakness: dames. He's a sucker for a pretty face, and forget fighting a female foe – his chivalry goes into overdrive.
So the question here is: Can you guide Spud through his wacky missions, navigating his seductive foes and saving PALIONAFOXA from the clutches of villainous vegetables?

The SPUDFATHER offers:

Spud's Lovable Weakness: Use Spud's charm and wit to disarm his enemies (especially the female ones!), turning foes into allies through hilarious dialogue and creative problem-solving.
A Veggie-licious World: Explore PALIONAFOXA City, a vibrant parody of classic eras filled with puns, slapstick humor, and wacky veggie gangsters.
A Rootin' Tootin' Good Time: The SPUDFATHER is perfect for gamers who love classic spy films, cheesy puns, and a healthy dose of absurdity.

So, are you ready to help Spud save the day (and maybe find love along the way)? Grab your fedora and trench coat, agent, because PALIONAFOXA needs
The SPUDFATHER!

content_descriptors.notes:
Heads up, adventurers! This game tackles some mature themes. Here's what you can expect:
Dark Humor: We like to push the boundaries of funny, so get ready for some jokes that might make you wince or snort with laughter (depending on your taste).
Partial Nudity: There will be instances of partial nudity, but nothing overly graphic.

So, is this game for you? If you enjoy edgy humor and a mature storyline, then dive right in! But if you prefer things a little more lighthearted, this might not be your cup of tea.

name: The SpudFather

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 9th Generation
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 11th Generation
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Sexuelle Andeutungen

short_description: In "Spudfather," become Spud, a charming secret agent on a veggie-fueled mission. Use charisma to disarm foes, especially the beauties who make Spud blush. This ain't your average garden - it's a world where bad guys are ripe for the pickin'!
